title: Skud
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of the Arts, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Risk-taking (psychology) in adolescence
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Teenagers - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family violence
description: Tasha comes from a dysfunctional family; alcoholic mother, abusive father and absent sister. She finds release in boxing and becomes friends with Matt whom she meets at a youth referral centre. Matt has his own problems, spending his time graffiting his tag, 'Skud', around railway stations and aspiring to train surfing. Matt drags Tasha into his world, compounding her problems and reaching a tragic conclusion. Starring Heather Bradley, Samuel Johnson, Lynda Gibson and Jules Hutchison.
